title: Would New Talon be able to...

replies.body: I don't know. But I find it sad somebody downvoted you for asking a question. Screw the boards and their passive, aggressive childishness. Can't just read a post and provide input, everyone absolutely must be rude.

I think in this case there are a couple of assassin players who are really salty about the way the reworks turned out and are downvoting every post that mentions their particular grievance case, because a lot of other question threads have gone relatively untouched while a few other assassin-mentioning threads get random downvotes nearly the moment they come out.

I definitely think there are players here who will downvote purely on disagreement, even if that disagreement is with Riot and not the post itself, but I also feel there are some players who get competitive with thread presence, and will downvote other threads to bump theirs up. League Boards use the same format as Reddit and, like Reddit, have developed their own subculture of upvote farming, especially on Gameplay, so it wouldn't surprise me if there were similar kinds of upvote manipulation going on.

Oh yeah that's a thing isn't it...

I set my thread display to newest update a long, long time ago, so it's never actually affected which threads come up for me.  I never even thought about that...

The more you know!

> [{quoted}](name=Xyntheyxz,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=JQ94gm7s,comment-id=00090000,timestamp=2016-10-20T11:55:39.320+0000)

I'm kind of sure that his E has a max range, so you can't hob over huge walls

> [{quoted}](name=Tsukic,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=JQ94gm7s,comment-id=000900000000,timestamp=2016-10-20T13:18:23.718+0000)
>
> I'm kind of sure that his E has a max range, so you can't hob over huge walls

We gotta rely on Vandiril to know then...

E has around the 1.5x the range of flash. You can target the point where you want to end up. If there is no wall, nothing happens. If there is a wall between you and your targeted area, you hop over. If there is still wall even after your targeted area, you don't hop or hop so that you end up in an area that would be in your initial range.

Tl;dr
You can't hop over any walls that are larger than your E range
If the targeted area of the wall isn't isn't over the halfway point, you will still dash sideways, instead of over the wall.
The rioter who worked on Talon already confirmed that you can't surf her wall, E has a max range.
all terrain. am guessing excluding azir ult because it knocks you back.
That's what a Rioter said.  There was also apparently some bug with Taliyah's wall, but that may have been fixed now.
aswell as trundle pillar and j4 ult

apparently he can

He can jump over all the walls except Azir wall they will push talon back

Apparently he goes really really slow over trundle pillars though xD

Plus you can wall run if you aim it correctly!

He should be able to jump over {{champion:34}} , {{champion:163}}  {{champion:59}} , and maybe {{champion:268}}

Yes, he can. The champion-created terrain it appears he cannot vault over right now is Azir R, most likely because it is designed to keep you away. (Have not tested ally Azir though. Only heard anything about Azir at all through people speaking about it.)

jarvan mains are gonna be sad.

until now, talon could only situationally get out of the ult, when he had a target in e range on the other side. i feel sorry for them. more and more champions simply dont care about his arena.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gCgc8JJMqvY

He can towers.
yes, but he can't hop over {{champion:163}} {{champion:268}} walls until they are fully formed.
or hop over wall in game of thrones? whitewalker?

It's entirely possible that Talon won't be able to jump over Yorick's wall because that wall is targetable. Clicking the wall to jump over it might end up causing Talon to auto attack it instead.

Taliyah and Anivia's walls I'm pretty sure work.
Yes. Vandiril did a bideo testing every possible wall. Only wall you vant jump over is enemy azir wall
Every terrain except azir ult.
The real question is, if he can does he have to wait the full cool down to jump it again, or can he jump it every time they put it up?
If he can (and I think he can) then any new placement of said walls counts as a new one, hence it should be hoppable.

I have a PBE account, i can try to find out for you when i get home from class. Need something to kill time before doom bots anyway
EDIT: Never mind looks like others got you the answer already
Yes, although I think Azir wall boots him back

I figured for the sake of balance they would probably not allow him to do it on champion made structures, though that would make him a bit less mobile than other assassins in that one instance, so I can't say for sure what they want to do with it.
